00045 class CL_OutlineCircle
00046 {
00049 
00050  public:
00052         CL_OutlineCircle() :
00053                 position(-1.0,-1.0),
00054                 radius(0),
00055                 start(0),
00056                 end(0)
00057         {
00058                 return;
00059         }
00060 
00064 
00065  public:
00069         bool collide(const CL_OutlineCircle &other) const
00070         {
00071                 if( &other == this )
00072                         return false;
00073 
00074                 CL_Pointf pos = position - other.position;
00075                 float dist = float(sqrt( pos.x*pos.x+pos.y*pos.y ));
00076 
00077                 if( dist > (radius + other.radius) )
00078                         return false;
00079 
00080                 return true;
00081         }
00082 
00086 
00087  public:
00088         CL_Pointf position;
00089         float radius;
00090         unsigned int start;
00091         unsigned int end;
00093 };
